content:
US Ambassador Bridget Brynk commented on three consecutive alarms that were announced in Kiev on the night of March 30 to March 31, 2024.

This is stated inmessageUS Embassies in Ukraine.

"5:30 in the morning on Sunday, the third air alarm over the night, the whole country should go through the rockets that Russia launches all over Ukraine," Bridget Brinkk said.

As reported by the Armyinform, fordataThe Air Force of the Armed Forces, on the night of March 31, 2024, the Russian invaders attacked 14 winged missiles X-101/X-555, 11 shaped UAVs, Iskander-M ballistic missile and a controlled X-59 aviation missile.

At the same time, Ukraine's air defense has shot down 9 winged missiles X-101/X-555 and 9 shock UAVs Shahd-136/131 Russian invaders.
title: US Ambassador reacted for three consecutive air alarm overnight
description: This is stated in the US Embassy in Ukraine. “5:30 am on Sunday, third ...
author: Army Inform
